Package mdlc

Class Description

  • java.lang.Object
    • mdlc.Description
  • class Description
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates the maze description, read from the MDL file

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> allLines
      Stores the strings representing the specified paths indexed by a path ID
      protected Coordinate currentPosition
      Defines the coordinates of the current position (of a solver)
      protected Coordinate entrance
      Defines the coordinate of the entrance to the maze
      protected Coordinate exit
      Defines the coordinates of the exit of the maze
      protected java.awt.Color gridColor
      Defines the color of the grid (if visible)
      protected int height
      Defines the height of the maze (in number of cells)
      private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Coordinate> lineCoords
      Stores the initial coordinates of each path indexed by a path ID
      protected SquareType[][] maze
      Stores the actual maze
      protected Mode outputMode
      Defines the output mode of the compiler: to generate code or image
      protected char pathChar
      Defines the character that will be used as a place-holder in Java/Python code for representing vacant cells
      protected java.awt.Color pathColor
      Defines the color of vacant cells
      protected int pathInt
      Defines the integer that will be used as a place-holder in Java/Python code for representing vacant cells
      protected char positionChar
      Defines the character that will be used as a place-holder in Java/Python code for representing the current-cell (in case of a solver)
      protected java.awt.Color positionColor
      Defines the color of the filled-circle drawn to indicate the current position in absence of a sprite-image
      protected int positionInt
      Defines the integer that will be used as a place-holder in Java/Python code for representing the current cell (in case of a solver)
      protected java.awt.image.BufferedImage positionSprite
      Defines the sprite image that will be drawn to indicate the current position (of a solver)
      protected boolean showGrid
      Defines whether a thin grid will be visible to separate individual cells in the maze
      protected boolean showIndices
      Defines whether the coordinates of the cells will be shown as row and column headers
      protected int squareSize
      Defines the size of each cell (in pixels)
      protected char visitedChar
      Defines the character that will be used as a place-holder in Java/Python code for representing all cells which have been visited (in case of a solver)
      protected int visitedInt
      Defines the integer that will be used as a place-holder in Java/Python code for representing all cells that have been visited (by a solver)
      protected java.lang.Object[][] visitedPathColor
      Stores the status of each cell as an ArrayList of colors representing the visited path in case of multiple visited paths of different colors
      protected java.awt.image.BufferedImage visitedSprite
      Defines the sprite image that will be drawn to indicate the positions that have been visited (by a solver)
      protected java.lang.Object[][] visitStatus
      Stores the status of each cell as an ArrayList of directions representing the visited-path line shape
      protected char wallChar
      Defines the character that will be used as a place-holder in Java/Python code for representing blocked cells
      protected java.awt.Color wallColor
      Defines the color of the blocked cells
      protected int wallInt
      Defines the integer that will be used as a place-holder in Java/Python code for representing blocked cells
      protected int width
      Defines the width of the maze (in number of cells)

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Description()
      Default constructor to initialize all maze settings to their default values

    • Method Detail

      • readFile

        protected static Description readFile​(java.lang.String filename)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads a maze-description from a MDL file
        Parameters:
        filename - The MDL-file to read from
        Returns:
        A description-object describing the maze
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - On input error or on encountering invalid settings

                                        java.lang.String prefix,
                                        java.lang.String suffix)
        An utility function used to extract a portion of a string with the given prefix and suffix
        Parameters:
        s - The string to process
        prefix - The prefix to match
        suffix - The suffix to match
        Returns:
        The extracted substring with the given prefix and suffix

      • processSettings

        private static boolean processSettings​(Description desc,
                                       java.lang.String line)
        Processes configuration settings for the maze
        Parameters:
        desc - A description-object to store the settings into
        line - The setting read from file
        Returns:
        A boolean value indicating whether or not the setting was a valid setting with proper syntax

        Returns:

        private static boolean processVisitedPath​(Description desc,
                                          java.lang.String line)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Translates a visited-path description as a path-string to actual coordinates and stores them into a description object
        Parameters:
        desc - A description object to store the path information into
        line - A path description
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether the path was successfully processed
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • processRow

        private static boolean processRow​(Description desc,
                                  java.lang.String line)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Translates a maze description in row-format to actual coordinates and stores them into a description object
        Parameters:
        desc - A description object to store the maze information into
        line - A string describing one row of the maze
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether the row was successfully processed
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - On processing error

                                                      int colIndex)
        Determines the coordinate on a position in a given path
        Parameters:
        lineIndex - The path ID
        colIndex - The position-index on that path
        Returns:
        Coordinate The coordinate of that position on that path

      • enumerateMoves

        private static java.lang.String enumerateMoves​(java.lang.String line)
        Expands a condensed movement string
        Parameters:
        line - A string containing a movement string in condensed form
        Returns:
        The expanded movement string

      • validateMoveString

        private static java.lang.String validateMoveString​(java.lang.String s)
        Checks if a movement string is valid, i.e. there is no re-traversal over the same path in the opposite direction
        Parameters:
        s - The movement string
        Returns:
        null if the movement string is invalid, or the movement string itself unchanged if it is valid

      • getVisitDirection

        private static VisitDirection getVisitDirection​(int index,
                                                Coordinate[] coords)
        Determines the direction of a visited-path at a particular point on the path
        Parameters:
        index - A position-index on a visited path
        coords - A list of coordinates representing the visited path
        Returns:
        The direction to face at the given position on the path

      • getDirectionRelativeTo

        private static Direction getDirectionRelativeTo​(Coordinate from,
                                                Coordinate to)
        Determines the direction of a position with respect to another position
        Parameters:
        from - The first position
        to - The second position
        Returns:
        The direction of the second position with respect to the first position
